calculations.name: MTM Stress T-1  (In CAD)
calculations.tableau_expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [MAX_DATE -1day]= [RpDate] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Comparison date] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END END

calculation_context.Expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [MAX_DATE -1day]= [RpDate] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Comparison date] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END END

calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date])
when 1 then [Max Date]-2
when 2 then [Max Date]-3
else [Max Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.Comparison date: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [MAX_DATE -1day] ELSE  [Parameters].[Date X (comparison date)] END
calculated_fields.MTM Stress (in CAD):
((IF [Cash curr]="EUR" THEN [Parameters].[Parameter 9] ELSEIF [Cash curr]="GBP" THEN [Parameters].[EUR Shift (copy)_2036471465060552715] END))
*(IF [Cash curr]="EUR" THEN -[DV01 (In USD)] *100 *[Parameters].[Use Custom Date0]
ELSEIF [Cash curr]="GBP" THEN -[DV01 (In USD)] *100 * [Parameters].[Use Custom Date0] END)
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
